Body:
Description: failed to start nginx service a high performance web server and a reverse proxy

I am getting this error after creating a VM on Proxmox with the specified server version. I can access the gui to set the network, enable ssh etc. But cannot access the CLI or reach the server over SSH after enabling it. Please let me know how to proceed as it is difficult to debug without access to the CLI.
What We've Learned Updated: We have informed the customer about the possible cause of the issue, missing one of the Network Adapters, and suggested adding it to the VM. It has solved his issue.
Next Steps Updated: We are waiting forthe  customer's confirmation

What We've Learned Updated: We have informed the customer about the possible cause of the issue, missing one of the Network Adapters, and suggested adding it to the VM. It has solved his issue.

We informed the customer about the need to whitelist the EPP in the SentinelOne antivirus to resolve his second issue.
